extends java.lang.Object

    1.3
    Author:
    Noah Tobias Lackenberger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraObject(android.content.Context context, android.view.TextureView textureView)
      The constructor for a Camera Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeCamera()
      This method closes the camera, sets all camera devices free and stops all background-activities It must be called before the super constructor of "onPause()"!!!!
      void openCamera(int width, int height)
      This Method opens the camera properly
      boolean permissionResult(int requestCode, java.lang.String[] permissions, int[] grantResults)
      This method must be called in the on onRequestPermissionsResult method.
      void resumeCamera()
      This method handles all things for resuming the camera (check if the camera is available, open the camera, etc.)
      android.net.Uri returnLatestFileUri()
      This method returns the URI / path of the most recent picture
      void startCamera()
      This method starts the camera.
      void takePicture()
      This method is responsible for taking pictures via an request, and saves the taken image to the gallery

    • Constructor Detail

      • CameraObject

        public CameraObject(android.content.Context context,
                    android.view.TextureView textureView)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        The constructor for a Camera Object

        Parameters:
        context - the main class must be passed here as context

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - is thrown if a passed argument is not valid

    • Method Detail

      • startCamera

        public void startCamera()
        This method starts the camera. It must be called right after the constructor

      • openCamera

        public void openCamera(int width,
                       int height)
                throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        This Method opens the camera properly

        Parameters:
        width - the width of the output size of the camera picture / preview
        height - the height of the output size of the camera picture / preview

        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException -

      • closeCamera

        public void closeCamera()
                 throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        This method closes the camera, sets all camera devices free and stops all background-activities

        It must be called before the super constructor of "onPause()"!!!!

        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException -

      • resumeCamera

        public void resumeCamera()
        This method handles all things for resuming the camera (check if the camera is available, open the camera, etc.)

        It must be called after the super constructor of "onResume()"!!!!

      • permissionResult

        public boolean permissionResult(int requestCode,
                                @NonNull
                                java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                @NonNull
                                int[] grantResults)
        This method must be called in the on onRequestPermissionsResult method. It handles the successful case of the Permission result

        Parameters:
        requestCode - requestCode parameter of onRequestPermissionsResult
        permissions - permissions parameter of onRequestPermissionsResult
        grantResults - grantResults parameter of onRequestPermissionsResult
        Returns:
        false ... the super constructor of onRequestPermissionsResult must be called! -- true ... must not be handled!

      • takePicture

        public void takePicture()
                 throws android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException
        This method is responsible for taking pictures via an request, and saves the taken image to the gallery

        Throws:
        android.hardware.camera2.CameraAccessException - is thrown, when the camera access is denied

      • returnLatestFileUri

        public android.net.Uri returnLatestFileUri()
        This method returns the URI / path of the most recent picture

        Returns:
        the URI from the most recent file
